title: Do you miss the world cup already? It went by so fast. For some reason, it is different than previous world cups

author: [deleted]
text: No I don’t miss it. We all know it was rigged for Messi

author: [deleted]
text: It’s not good to talk down on yourself like that

author: joa-kolope
text: Let us know when your boo boo feels better.

author: [deleted]
text: Took you two minutes to come up with that 5 year old response?

author: joa-kolope
text: Ahh poor whittle baby still has a boo boo. You’re ok whittle guy. It will get better soon.

author: [deleted]
text: sad to see you re still butthurt your favorite country didn't won
